name: WE ARE Pi
description: WE ARE Pi is an ideas company founded on international Pi day, March 14th 2011. We are on a mission to inspire and enable thought leaders in brands, culture and society with creativity that moves the world forwards. Pi is defined as a number that never ends and never settles into a permanently repeating pattern. Therefore, Never Settle is an attitude we apply to our team, relationships, and ideas we put out into the world though our work.
